overview: Kate Coldwell serves as an expert resource and advisor for GamePro Media’s business operations, managers and employees. She is responsible for the company’s payroll and benefits administration, staffing and recruitment, employee relations, legal compliance and HR policies and procedures. Kate also works with other IDG businesses, including PC World Communications and Mac Publishing. Prior to joining IDG, Kate was the Director of Human Resources and Office Administration for Chronicle Books from 1992 to 1998. She held the position of Personnel Manager for PLM International from 1987 to 1991 and taught special education. Kate holds a BA in History from the University of Virginia.
